pages.text: $(li)Nobody know who build multiple towers over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Anyway, these structures will be useful during your journey.$(br)$(li)Not only because of the treasures hidden inside, but because of the $(l:patchouli:perks/waystones)Waystones$(/l).
$(li)It is said that in the past these towers were interconnected and allowed fast travel between them.
